member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero; otherwise zero.

member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the module; otherwise null.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Configuration.NativeMethods.dlclose(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Frees the loaded dynamic-link library (DLL) module and, if necessary, decrements its reference count. When the reference count reaches zero, the module is unloaded from the address space of the calling process and the handle is no longer valid.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTagType.ASCII

If you set the type data member of a PropertyItem object to ExifPropertyTagTypeASCII, you should set the length data member to the length of the string including the NULL terminator. For example, the string HELLO would have a length of 6.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTagType.UShort

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTagType.Undefined
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTagType.SLong
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTagType.SRational

member.name: T:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag
member.summary: The following enum gives descriptions of the property items supported by Windows GDI+.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsVer
member.summary: Version of the Global Positioning Systems (GPS) IFD, given as 2.0.0.0. This tag is mandatory when the tag is present. When the version is 2.0.0.0, the tag value is 0x02000000.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsLatitudeRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the longitude is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsLatitude
member.summary: Latitude. Latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsLongitudeRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the longitude is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsLongitude
member.summary: Longitude. Longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsAltitudeRef
member.summary: Reference altitude, in meters.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsAltitude
member.summary: Altitude, in meters, based on the reference altitude specified by .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsGpsTime
member.summary: Time as coordinated universal time (UTC). The value is expressed as three rational numbers that give the hour, minute, and second.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsGpsSatellites
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the GPS satellites used for measurements. This tag can be used to specify the ID number, angle of elevation, azimuth, SNR, and other information about each satellite. The format is not specified. If the GPS receiver is incapable of taking measurements, the value of the tag must be set to NULL.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsGpsStatus
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the status of the GPS receiver when the image is recorded. A means measurement is in progress, and V means the measurement is Interoperability.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsGpsMeasureMode
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the GPS measurement mode. 2 specifies 2-D measurement, and 3 specifies 3-D measurement.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsGpsDop
member.summary: GPS DOP (data degree of precision). An HDOP value is written during 2-D measurement, and a PDOP value is written during 3-D measurement.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsSpeedRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the unit used to express the GPS receiver speed of movement. K, M, and N represent kilometers per hour, miles per hour, and knots respectively.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsSpeed
member.summary: Speed of the GPS receiver movement.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsTrackRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference for giving the direction of GPS receiver movement. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsTrack
member.summary: Direction of GPS receiver movement. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsImgDirRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference for the direction of the image when it is captured. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsImgDir
member.summary: Direction of the image when it was captured. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsMapDatum
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies geodetic survey data used by the GPS receiver. If the survey data is restricted to Japan, the value of this tag is TOKYO or WGS-84.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestLatRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the latitude of the destination point is north or south latitude. N specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestLat
member.summary: Latitude of the destination point. The latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestLongRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the longitude of the destination point is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestLong
member.summary: Longitude of the destination point. The longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestBearRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference used for giving the bearing to the destination point. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestBear
member.summary: Bearing to the destination point. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestDistRef
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the unit used to express the distance to the destination point. K, M, and N represent kilometers, miles, and knots respectively.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsDestDist
member.summary: Distance to the destination point.

member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the image.

member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the image.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.StripOffsets
member.summary: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip. See also and .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.Orientation
member.summary: Image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.SamplesPerPixel
member.summary: Number of color components per pixel.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.RowsPerStrip
member.summary: Number of rows per strip. See also and .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.StripBytesCount
member.summary: For each strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.MinSampleValue
member.summary: For each color component, the minimum value assigned to that component. See also .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.MaxSampleValue
member.summary: For each color component, the maximum value assigned to that component. See also .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.XResolution
member.summary: Number of pixels per unit in the image width (x) direction. The unit is specified by .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.YResolution

member.summary: Luminance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type . If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

member.summary: Chrominance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries. If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

member.summary: ICC profile embedded in the image.

member.summary: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used. The string is compatible with the standard developed by the ASTM Technical Committee.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.GpsIFD
member.summary: Offset to a block of GPS property items. Property items whose tags have the prefix Gps are stored in the GPS block. The GPS property items are defined in the EXIF specification. GDI+ uses this tag to locate GPS information, but GDI+ does not expose this tag for public use.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifISOSpeed
member.summary: ISO speed and ISO latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifOECF
member.summary: Optoelectronic conversion function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524. The OECF is the relationship between the camera optical input and the image values.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifVer
member.summary: Version of the EXIF standard supported. Nonexistence of this field is taken to mean non-conformance to the standard. Conformance to the standard is indicated by recording 0210 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is , there is no NULL terminator.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifDTOrig
member.summary: Date and time when the original image data was generated. For a DSC, the date and time when the picture was taken. The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000). The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator. When the field is empty, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifDTDigitized
member.summary:
Date and time when the image was stored as digital data. If, for example, an image was captured by DSC and at the same time the file was recorded, then DateTimeOriginal and DateTimeDigitized will have the same contents.
The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000). The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator. When the field is empty, it is treated as unknown.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifCompConfig
member.summary:
Information specific to compressed data. The channels of each component are arranged in order from the first component to the fourth. For uncompressed data, the data arrangement is given in the PhotometricInterp tag.
However, because PhotometricInterp can only express the order of Y, Cb, and Cr, this tag is provided for cases when compressed data uses components other than Y, Cb, and Cr and to support other sequences.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifCompBPP
member.summary: Information specific to compressed data. The compression mode used for a compressed image is indicated in unit BPP.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifShutterSpeed
member.summary: Shutter speed. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifAperture
member.summary: Lens aperture. The unit is the APEX value.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifBrightness
member.summary: Brightness value. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifExposureBias
member.summary: Exposure bias. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range -99.99 to 99.99.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifMaxAperture
member.summary: Smallest F number of the lens. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of 00.00 to 99.99, but it is not limited to this range.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifSubjectDist
member.summary: Distance to the subject, measured in meters.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifMeteringMode
member.summary: Metering mode.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifLightSource
member.summary: Type of light source.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFlash
member.summary: Flash status. This tag is recorded when an image is taken using a strobe light (flash). Bit 0 indicates the flash firing status, and bits 1 and 2 indicate the flash return status.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFocalLength
member.summary: Actual focal length, in millimeters, of the lens. Conversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 millimeter film camera.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifMakerNote
member.summary: Note tag. A tag used by manufacturers of EXIF writers to record information. The contents are up to the manufacturer.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifUserComment
member.summary: Comment tag. A tag used by EXIF users to write keywords or comments about the image besides those in and without the character-code limitations of the tag.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifDTSubsec
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the tag.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifDTOrigSS
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the tag.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifDTDigSS
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the ExifDTDigitized tag.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFPXVer
member.summary: FlashPix format version supported by an FPXR file. If the FPXR function supports FlashPix format version 1.0, this is indicated similarly to by recording 0100 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is , there is no NULL terminator.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifColorSpace
member.summary: Color space specifier. Normally sRGB (=1) is used to define the color space based on the PC monitor conditions and environment. If a color space other than sRGB is used, Uncalibrated (=0xFFFF) is set. Image data recorded as Uncalibrated can be treated as sRGB when it is converted to FlashPix.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifPixXDim
member.summary: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid width of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag, whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifPixYDim
member.summary: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid height of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file. Because data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height tag will be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifRelatedWav
member.summary: The name of an audio file related to the image data. The only relational information recorded is the EXIF audio file name and extension (an ASCII string that consists of 8 characters plus a period (.), plus 3 characters). The path is not recorded. When you use this tag, audio files must be recorded in conformance with the EXIF audio format. Writers can also store audio data within APP2 as FlashPix extension stream data.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifInterop
member.summary: Offset to a block of property items that contain interoperability information.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFlashEnergy
member.summary: Strobe energy, in Beam Candle Power Seconds (BCPS), at the time the image was captured.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifSpatialFR
member.summary: Camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFocalXRes
member.summary: Number of pixels in the image width (x) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFocalYRes
member.summary: Number of pixels in the image height (y) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFocalResUnit
member.summary: Unit of measure for and .

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifSubjectLoc
member.summary: Location of the main subject in the scene. The value of this tag represents the pixel at the center of the main subject relative to the left edge. The first value indicates the column number, and the second value indicates the row number.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifExposureIndex
member.summary: Exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image was captured.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifSensingMethod
member.summary: Image sensor type on the camera or input device.

member.name: F:ImageProcessor.Imaging.MetaData.ExifPropertyTag.ExifFileSource
member.summary: The image source. If a DSC recorded the image, the value of this tag is 3.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ImageProcessor.Imaging.Convolution.Threshold
member.summary:
Gets or sets the threshold to add to the weighted sum.
Specifies the threshold value, which is added to each weighted sum of pixels.

member.name: P:ImageProcessor.Imaging.Convolution.Divider
member.summary:
Gets or sets the value used to divide convolution; the weighted sum of pixels is divided by this value.
If not set this value will be automatically calculated.

member.name: P:ImageProcessor.Imaging.Convolution.UseDynamicDividerForEdges
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the dynamic divider for edges.
If it is set to , then the same divider, specified by property or calculated automatically, will be applied both for non-edge regions and for edge regions. If the value is set to , then the dynamically calculated divider will be used for edge regions. This is calculated from the sum of the kernel elements used at that region, which are taken into account for particular processed pixel (elements, which are not outside image).
Default value is set to .
